name: DeepNAP
paper: DeepNAP: Deep Neural Anomaly Pre-Detection in a Semiconductor Fab.
description: DeepNAP is an anomaly pre-detection model based on recurrent neural networks. More specifically, DeepNAP learns to detect anomalies using partial reconstruction. According to the authors, partial reconstruction based models effectively detect anomalies without the need for non-anomalous training data.
